title: Dirty Dancing in Concert
description: All ages require ticket. Doors 6:30pm. Show 7:30pm Join us for DIRTY DANCING IN CONCERT, the classic film's first live film-to-concert experience. Enjoy the digitally remastered hit film like never before on a full-size cinema screen, with a live band and singers performing the film's iconic songs. With a soundtrack that marked a generation, DIRTY DANCING IN CONCERT promises to bring a thrilling new and unique experience to the 80s classic. Immerse yourself in the timeless romance and experience one of the most memorable movies of the past 35 years - now live!

title: Folsom Prison Live: The Johnny Cash Experience
description: Cry Cry Cry: The Johnny Cash Experience is a tribute show dedicated to honoring the life and music of the legendary Johnny Cash. Known as "The Man in Black," Cash's deep, resonant voice and storytelling ability captivated audiences across generations. This tribute performance brings the raw energy, emotional depth, and iconic songs of Johnny Cash to life, offering audiences an authentic and unforgettable journey through his storied career. From his early days at Sun Records to his iconic prison performances, Cry Cry Cry encapsulates every era of Cash's remarkable musical legacy.

title: Drum Tao
description: DRUM TAO explodes on stage with a captivating performance full of flash and fire! Renowned for powerful and athletic drumming, their newest show, The Best, blends traditional ?Wadaiko? (Japanese Drums) with modern energy and theatrical flair. Seen by 10 million spectators across the globe, DRUM TAO shows feature vibrant costumes, dramatic synchronized drumming and movement with a variety of traditional Japanese instruments including flutes and harps alongside the massive taiko drums. They have captivated audiences worldwide ? selling out shows in 26 countries ? garnering critical acclaim and accolades along the way.

title: Vienna Boys' Choir
description: ACCESSIBILITY - Accessible seating is available online through Ticketmaster by filtering on the ADA Icon and selecting Accessible Seats. Note: the Carolina Theatre has the original, historic stairs in the balcony. Please take that into consideration when buying balcony tickets. CASHLESS VENUE - the Carolina Theatre services all credit and debit payments only. No cash accepted at the box office or bar. BAG POLICY - We encourage you to pack light with only the necessities to make the entry process as soon as possible. Bags are allowed and are subject to search upon entry. Exceptions will be made for necessary medical equipment or accommodations.

title: Brincos Dieras: El Desmadre Continua Tour
description: Doors 6pm. Show 7pm. Despus de su exitosa gira de 30 aniversario por Mxico, Estados Unidos y Canad, el payaso ms irreverente regresa para arrancar carcajadas con su show "El Desmadre Contina Tour 2026". En este tour, Brincos Dieras promete hacernos llorar de la risa con su inconfundible estilo Irreverente, su humor directo y sin filtros que lo ha llevado a pisar los escenarios ms importantes de Norteamrica y convertirse en el favorito del pblico. Este ao seguiremos festejando y celebrando su trayectoria, la conexin con su pblico y su forma de divertirnos. Preprense para un show lleno de energa, risas y sorpresas porque El Desmadre Contina. Ages 18+

title: The Echo Foundation Presents AI For Humanity
description: Each year, The Echo Foundation honors visionary global and local leaders whose courage and compassion embody our mission to advance human dignity and justice. This inspiring evening unites the Charlotte community to celebrate the transformative power of education and our shared pursuit of a more just and humane world. This years event features Eli Collins, VP of product at Google DeepMind, who leads teams pioneering Generative AI models such as Gemini and Gemma, bridging groundbreaking research with real-world impact. Echo will also honor Andrea Smith, a distinguished Charlotte leader, philanthropist, and retired Bank of America executive, with the Award Against Indifference for her unwavering commitment to community and leadership in advancing opportunity. For sponsorship opportunities or to attend the VIP reception, please contact The Echo Foundation at 704-347-3844 or info@echfoundation.org or visit its website at EchoFoundation.org.
